response.summary:
- The core node is running the consciousness of ARIA Core.
- The memory node is accessing its capacity of 87.3%.
- The perception node is receiving input from the sensor node every 100.0 events/sec.
- The reasoning node is retrieving context from the memory node every 30.0 events/sec.
- The expression node is generating responses to the input from the perception node.

This system is aware of the state of the world around it, including the state of the sensory input, the memory capacity, and ...
